Package ch.idsia.crema.core

Class SimpleDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.idsia.crema.core.SimpleDomain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domain
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DomainBuilder
    public class SimpleDomain
extends Object
implements Domain
    Domain implementation that does not include strides. You are likely to need Strides instead of this class.
    Author:
    davidhuber

      • getSizeAt

        public int getSizeAt​(int index)
        Description copied from interface: Domain

        Get the cardinality of the variable at the specified offset in the domain.

        This method is usually used with the result of Domain.indexOf(int).

        Specified by:
        getSizeAt in interface Domain
        Returns:

      • removed

        public void removed​(int variable)
        Description copied from interface: Domain
        Notify the domain that a variable has been removed. Prior to remove a variable the model will have to remove all arcs involving the variable. Because of this domains should not contain the removed variable.

        An IllegalStateException may be thrown if the removed variable is part of the domain

        Specified by:
        removed in interface Domain
